page.title: 20HEALTH
page.content: There are 3 doctors in Handcross.90 patients visit the surgery a week.The most common illnesses are coughs and colds. They write about 944 prescriptions a month.Cough medicine and antibiotics are given to cure most illnesses.The nearest hospitals are Cuckfield and Crawley.The triple injection is given to young children to protect them from tetanus,whooping cough and polio. The dentist visits Handcross School twice a year.He has a fully equipped trailer .He does about 12 fillings a day.The instruments that he uses are called pegs,tweezers,and electric drills which cost from 80p to Â£4.50. The school nurse comes to school six times a year and she checks our eye sight ,hearing ,and she looks for nits in our hair.She shows videos about the way to keep healthy.
